sentences.en: Many Louisianans fret that Gulf - based drilling rigs will decamp for West Africa or Brazil.
sentences.cn: 许多路易斯安那人担心墨西哥湾的钻进设备会被撤向西非或巴西.

sentences.en: The company is decamping to Asia with 1,700 jobs.
sentences.cn: 这家公司带着1,700份工作正逃往亚洲。

trans.tran_cn: 秘密而匆忙地移居, 撤营, 逃走, 逃亡
trans.tran_en: If you decamp, you go away from somewhere secretly or suddenly

trans.tran_cn: （突然而常为秘密地）（携某物）逃走，撤营，离开宿营地
